item.title: Glories of Rama Naam by Lord Shiva
item.description: Lord Shiva says that uttering Raam/Rama/Ram three times is equal to uttering Vishnu Sahasranama. It is so beneficial in the present Kaliyuga age. Padma Puran Rama Naam by Shiva In this Puran Lord Shiva tells that by just uttering Rama naam once you achieve fruits of reading the vedas and chanting the various mantras many times. Skanda Puran Upon inquiring about whom Lord Shiva meditates on, Lord replies by stating that " it is the name of raam " and tells that one who is in every animate and inanimate object is called as rama.
